StrideAI | Bangalore, India | Frontend, Fullstack, NLP, Devops | Full-time, Intern | Onsite | https://stride.ai/

StrideAI is a fast growing Cognitive Automation company. We work mostly with large investment banks and insurance companies to bring efficiency and speed to their operations. We do so by leveraging our proprietary AI platform.

To this end, we are hiring for the following profiles:

* Fullstack developer

* Frontend/Design

* NLP engineer

* Devops engineer

* QA automation engineer

Job perks:

- Opportunity to work with a small cohesive team of smart people

- We encourage our people to attend tech events, publish papers (sponsored by the company)

- Team outings, lunches etc

You can apply through https://stride.ai/careers or reach out to me directly on pratheek @ stride [dot] ai

Note: Internships are for NLP role only.
